title: Unless Congress Intervenes, Recreational Pot Is About To Be Legal In D.C.
teaser: Beginning Thursday, residents of Washington, D.C. will be free to smoke marijuana recreationally. D.C.'s new law allows people over 21 to possess, grow and smoke  pot, but not sell it. Congress, however, has been trying to stop the legalization.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
